alert.note: Alert for Boise; Elmore (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 4:00PM MDT until August 12 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL BOISE AND NORTH CENTRAL ELMORE COUNTIES... At 400 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Twin Springs, or 10 miles southeast of Idaho City, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Idaho City and Barber Flat Guard Station around 420 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
